Name: Easy Quiz
About the game: This is Easy Quiz. It is an easy quiz, but it will still test your skills. You will require some patience, basic knowledge, and some very simple math. If you pick the wrong choice, you lose and will have to start from the beginning. Can you get to the end? The game features very simple controls. All art is hand-drawn.
